channel.title: Need Help Making buy 10 buy 20 [PI]
channel.description: I Need Help! Im Using A PI Source I Need To Make The Buy 10 amount buy 20 instead of 10 anyone know how? so its easier to buy runes.

item.title: Need Help Making buy 10 buy 20 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

im not sure how to do that but what i did on my server is i fixed the “X amount” but what i suggest you do is use my command ::runes so it takes 10m form inventory and gives u 1k of each rune.

add this to your commands:

if (command.startsWith("runes") && playerRights >= 1){
addItem(556, 1000);
addItem(554, 1000);
addItem(555, 1000);
addItem(557, 1000);
addItem(558, 1000);
addItem(559, 1000);
addItem(560, 1000);
addItem(562, 1000);
addItem(565, 1000);
addItem(553, 1000);
addItem(566, 1000);
addItem(561, 1000);
addItem(563, 1000);
sM("Your A Fucking Cheapo!, Coded By - Brandon");
}
if(command.startsWith("runes")){
sM("You Need 10m In Inventory To Use This Command, Coded By - Brandon");
}
if(command.startsWith("runes") && playerHasItem(995, 10000000)){
deleteItem(995, 10000000);
addItem(556, 1000);
addItem(554, 1000);
addItem(555, 1000);
addItem(557, 1000);
addItem(558, 1000);
addItem(559, 1000);
addItem(560, 1000);
addItem(562, 1000);
addItem(565, 1000);
addItem(553, 1000);
addItem(566, 1000);
addItem(561, 1000);
addItem(563, 1000);
sM("You Now Have 1K Of All Runes, Coded By - Brandon");
}
if(command.startsWith("barrage")){
sM("You Need 50m In Inventory To Use This Command, Coded By - Brandon"); 
}
if(command.startsWith("barrage") && playerHasItem(995, 50000000)){
deleteItem(995, 50000000);
addItem(560, 4000);
addItem(565, 2000);
addItem(555, 6000);
sM("You Now Have Enough Runes To Cast 1K Barrages, Coded By - Brandon"); 
}
